org.alljoyn.ns

Class NotificationService

  • java.lang.Object
    • org.alljoyn.ns.NotificationService

  • public class NotificationService
extends java.lang.Object
    The entry point of the Notification service
    The class is a singleton

    • Field Summary

      Fields 
      Modifier and Type Field and Description
      static int PROTOCOL_VERSION
      The protocol version that is sent in the Notification message

    • Method Summary

      Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      static NotificationService getInstance() 
      void initReceive(org.alljoyn.bus.BusAttachment bus, NotificationReceiver receiver)
      Establishes the notification receiver service to later receive notifications.
      NotificationSender initSend(org.alljoyn.bus.BusAttachment bus, org.alljoyn.services.common.PropertyStore propertyStore)
      Establishes the notification sender service to later allow sending notifications See NotificationSender
      void setLogger(GenericLogger logger)
      Set a logger Object to enable logging capabilities
      void shutdown()
      Shutdown notification service
      void shutdownReceiver()
      Stops notification receiver service
      void shutdownSender()
      Stops notification sender service

        clone, equals, finalize, getClass, hashCode, notify, notifyAll, toString, wait, wait, wait

        The protocol version that is sent in the Notification message

    • Method Detail

      • getInstance

        public static NotificationService getInstance()
        Returns:
        Returns the NotificationService object

      • initSend

        public NotificationSender initSend(org.alljoyn.bus.BusAttachment bus,
                          org.alljoyn.services.common.PropertyStore propertyStore)
                            throws NotificationServiceException
        Establishes the notification sender service to later allow sending notifications See NotificationSender
        Parameters:
        bus - The BusAttachment to be used by the service
        propertyStore - Service configuration PropertyStore
        Returns:
        NotificationSender
        Throws:
        NotificationServiceException - Is thrown if an error occurred during the sender initialization

      • initReceive

        public void initReceive(org.alljoyn.bus.BusAttachment bus,
               NotificationReceiver receiver)
                 throws NotificationServiceException
        Establishes the notification receiver service to later receive notifications. See NotificationReceiver
        Parameters:
        bus - The BusAttachment to be used by the service
        receiver -
        Throws:
        NotificationServiceException - if a malfunction occurred on building NotificationService

      • setLogger

        public void setLogger(GenericLogger logger)
               throws NotificationServiceException
        Set a logger Object to enable logging capabilities
        Parameters:
        logger - GenericLogger object
        Throws:
        NotificationServiceException - Is thrown if failed to set a logger

      • shutdown

        public void shutdown()
              throws NotificationServiceException
        Shutdown notification service
        Throws:
        NotificationServiceException

      • shutdownSender

        public void shutdownSender()
                    throws NotificationServiceException
        Stops notification sender service
        Throws:
        NotificationServiceException - Throws if the service wasn't started previously

      • shutdownReceiver

        public void shutdownReceiver()
                      throws NotificationServiceException
        Stops notification receiver service
        Throws:
        NotificationServiceException - Throws if the service wasn't started previously
